Detailed Description

Creates DataBuffer from file or URL.

Member Function Documentation

DataBuffer* DataBufferCreator::getDataBufferFromProgram (  const char *  command  )  [static]
 

Runs the program specified by command and tries to fill the DataBuffer from it.

Returns:
A databuffer if the loading was successful, NULL if failure.

MC2String DataBufferCreator::getMapOrIdxPath (  const MC2String &  filename,
uint32  mapSet = MAX_UINT32
)  [static]
 

Parameters:
mapSet Give this to specify map set, otherwise map set is read from mc2.prop.
filename The file name of the file to get path of.
Returns:
Returns a full path to a map file or index.db file.

DataBuffer* DataBufferCreator::loadFromMapServer (  const MC2String &  filename  )  [static]
 

Loads from map server.

Uses MAP_PATH_URL. If mapSet == MAX_UINT32 then the properties will be used.

DataBuffer* DataBufferCreator::loadMapOrIndexDB (  const MC2String &  filename,
uint32  mapSet = MAX_UINT32
)  throw ( MC2String ) [static]
 

Loads a map or index.db using the property values and the filename.

Will loadFromMapServer if no file exists.
